description:
Major Yngwie is a military officer that allied the soldiers from various colonies under the Kingdom`s reign in an attempt to gather an army large enough to overthrow and assassinate her Majesty the Queen. He was introduced by http://anidb.net/ch92240 [Zelda] to the http://anidb.net/ch88463 [Princess Charlotte], who joined their cause just to buy enough time for the girls from http://anidb.net/ch92207 [Principal Team] to get in position and act.
Major Ynqwie was supposed to use the key that would activate the mechanism which would make the ceiling collapse above the members of a royal family while they are in the Royal Cathedral. However, Princess stole the key from him and Zelda wounded her before she had a chance to run away. Before she could finish her off, Major stood in front of her and took a bullet, saving Princess from a certain death.
name: Yngwie
